outline: to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing (Qal) to speak (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk (Piel) to speak to promise (Pual) to be spoken (Hithpael) to speak (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
(Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
(Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
